titleStmt.title: The Christian mans assuring house. And a sinners conuersion Two sermons; the former, preached, before the Prince his Highnesse at St. Iames: the other to his Maiesties houshold at White-hall, on Sunday the 6. of February by George Meriton Doctor of Diuinitie, and Deane of Peterborough.
titleStmt.author: Meriton, George, d. 1624.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Edward Griffin for Ralfe Mab, and are to be sold in Paules Churchyard at the signe of the Greyhound,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: Paules Churchyard at the signe of the Greyhound
